spec_data.Name: php-doctrine-inflector
spec_data.Description:
Doctrine Inflector is a small library that can perform string manipulations
with regard to upper-/lowercase and singular/plural forms of words.

Autoloader: /usr/share/php/Doctrine/Common/Inflector/autoload.php
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 07:37:13 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Common string manipulations with regard to casing and singular/plural rules
